author: Reiner Decher
content: you might be interested in a ground level view of Op Dragoon by a US Intelligence officer who went thru Salerno, Anzio, and Op Dragoon (Camel side) thru France and into Austria where he and his 36th Div. arrested Goering. It is beautifully written with the manuscript in famiy files that I helped get published. “Invading Hitler’s Europe” by Roswell Doughty is worth a read.
